messages.message:
Looked at plotting reason for container terminated status reason during that time - but it looks like we dont have any data or events that I can pull from grafana:

`sum by (reason) (kube_pod_container_terminated_status_reason{tenant_id="", pod=~".*ocr-msft-form-recognizer-layout.*"})`

Should we increase the client side retry to tackle this further ?
